Title: Step 5: Return to Marcus Eldridge
Text: I've completed my visit to the War Museum and received a recommendation letter from Curator Evelyn Marston. I should return to Marcus Eldridge at the Gramados Town Hall to review my progress and see what the next steps are in obtaining the Marksmanship License.

Lore: §aEndorsed by the War Museum for dedication to Gramados' legacy.
display.Name: §3Curator's Recommendation Letter

CompleteText: Marcus Eldridge reviewed the recommendation letter from the War Museum and seemed pleased with my dedication. He mentioned that I'm on the right track and that the next phase of the journey will require even more focus and precision. It's time to prepare for the challenges ahead.
